casebody.data:
SILVER, et al.
v.
The HALIFAX COUNTY BOARD OF COMMISSIONERS 338A17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 26, 2017 Mr. Mark Dorosin, Ms. Elizabeth M. Haddix, Ms. Eileen O'Connor, Mr. Allen Buansi, Attorney at Law, For Silver, LaTonya, et al. Mr. Brent Ducharme, Attorney at Law. Mr. Garris Neil Yarborough, Glynn Rollins, Attorney at Law, For The Halifax County Board Of Commissioners. Mr. K. Ricky Watson, Jr., Co-Director of Youth Justice Project.

Ms. Peggy Nicholson, Attorney at Law, Mr. Seth Ascher, Ms. Jennifer Story, Mr. George Hausen, Jr., Legal Aid.

Wm Hodge, Ms. Jennifer W. Marsh, Director of Research.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 25th of October 2017 by Plaintiffs:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 26th of October 2017."
